title: Good PC, Good fps but the game is lagged
body: in this preseason the game is going very bad i have a pc with an nvidia GTX 750 ti 12Gb ram ddr3 and an AMD A10 6700 and i don't know why my game goes lagged,i play other games like dark souls 3 or battlefield 4 with a good framerate but in lol i got 60fps but the game don't have real 60fps i'm a bit tilted i tryed a lot of things....

replies.body: Based on your [specs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209010626-Frame-Skipping-on-High-End-PCs), you may need to cap your framerate via in-game video options to see if that helps.  If that doesn't work run through our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide and test it in a custom game.  Let me know if that helps.
